abstract: Suspended UEFA president Michel Platini appeals eight-year ban imposed by FIFA, denying any wrongdoing in connection with $2 million payment that was approved by Sepp Blatter.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Platini Makes Appeal
headline.main: Michel Platini Pleased With Hearing Over His Ban

snippet: Platini, the suspended UEFA president, was banned by FIFA for eight years over a $2 million payment approved by Sepp Blatter.
lead_paragraph: Platini, the suspended UEFA president, was banned by FIFA for eight years over a $2 million payment approved by Sepp Blatter.
